Exfiltration Over Asymmetric Encrypted Non-C2 Protocol
T1048.002::[Rclone] can exfiltrate data over SFTP or HTTPS via WebDAV.
T1048.003::[Rclone] can exfiltrate data over FTP or HTTP, including HTTP via WebDAV.
T1560.001::[Rclone] can compress files using `gzip` prior to exfiltration.
T1567.002::[Rclone] can exfiltrate data to cloud storage services such as Dropbox, Google Drive, Amazon S3, and MEGA.
